mod.name: Slimebound Mod
mod.description:
Adds a new playable enemy character: The Slimebound. 
 
 If you like the mod and want to support me, check out my multiplayer party game, Sumo, in Early Access on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/858960/Sumo/  
 
 Extra thanks to the creators of Mod the Spire and the Discord modding community.  
 
 Credit: kiooeht - The god.   JohnnyDevo, Reina, JohnnyBazooka89, Skyson, HypoSoc, Chronometrics for all the help. Translation credits - ZHS: Orakur and SunriseFox. FRN: Mootie. KOR: DCInside STS Gallery. ZHT: rainfoxest 
 
 Endless Thanks to my Patreon Supporters - Rhapsody, Alvin Tsang

cards.name: CA-CAW!
cards.description: Gain 1 Strength at the start of each turn.

cards.name: CA-CAW!+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Strength at the start of each turn.

cards.name: Charge Up
cards.description:
On your next turn, gain 8 Block and 2 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Charge Up+
cards.description:
On your next turn, gain 11 Block and 2 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Collect
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength and 1 Potency.
Gain 5 Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Collect+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength and 1 Potency.
Gain 8 Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dark Void
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies. The next time each enemy does not Attack on their turn, gain 1 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dark Void+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies. The next time each enemy does not Attack on their turn, gain 1 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Deca's Protection
cards.description:
Gain 1 Dexterity.
Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Deca's Protection+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Dexterity and 1 Artifact.
Add a random Power card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Defensive Mode
cards.description:
Gain 2 Thorns.
Gain 5 Block, and another 5 Block next turn.

cards.name: Defensive Mode+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Thorns.
Gain 8 Block, and another 8 Block next turn.

cards.name: Defensive Stance
cards.description:
Gain 4 Block.
Gain 2 Block at the end of each turn.

cards.name: Defensive Stance+
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Gain 2 Block at the end of each turn.

cards.name: Donu's Power
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Donu's Power+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength and 1 Artifact.
Add a random Attack card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Face Slap
cards.description:
Remove all of the enemy's Block.
Deal 7 damage. Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Face Slap+
cards.description:
Remove all of the enemy's Block.
Deal 10 damage. Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flail
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage twice to ALL enemies.
Gain 1 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flail+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage twice to ALL enemies.
Gain 1 Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Guardian Whirl
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage to ALL enemies 3 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Guardian Whirl+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies 3 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Head Slam
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage if the enemy is a Boss. If not, Stun them.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Head Slam+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage if the enemy is a Boss. If not, Stun them.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hexaburn
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage to ALL enemies twice.
This card's damage is equal to 1/10th of your current HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hexaburn+
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage to ALL enemies twice.
This card's damage is equal to 1/6th of your current HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Last Stand
cards.description:
Remove all Debuffs.
Gain 1 Strength, or !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Strength if you are below half HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Last Stand+
cards.description:
Remove all Debuffs.
Gain 1 Strength, or !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Strength if you are below half HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Manipulate Time
cards.description:
Trigger all effects that happen at the start of your turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Manipulate Time+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Block.
Trigger all effects that happen at the start of your turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Poly Beam
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage twice.
Deal 3 damage twice at the start of your next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Poly Beam+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage twice.
Deal 4 damage twice at the start of your next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: SLIME CRUSH!!!
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 50 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: SLIME CRUSH!!!+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Deal 60 damage.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sear
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage, plus an additional 2 damage every turn this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sear+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage, plus an additional 2 damage every turn this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Slime Beam
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Slime Beam+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Bronze
cards.description:
Split into a Bronze_Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Bronze+
cards.description:
Split into a Bronze_Slime, who deals 1 more damage and grants 1 more Block this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Cultist
cards.description:
Split into a Cultist_Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Cultist+
cards.description:
Split into a Cultist_Slime, who deals 2 more damage this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Ghostflame
cards.description:
Gain Slime Slots until you have 6.
Split into a Ghostflame_Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Ghostflame+
cards.description:
Gain Slime Slots until you have 7.
Split into a Ghostflame_Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Torch Head
cards.description:
Split into a Torch_Head_Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Torch Head+
cards.description:
Split into a Torch_Head_Slime, who deals 2 more damage this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Time Ripple
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Apply Slow to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Time Ripple+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Apply Slow to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Useful Slime!
cards.description:
Draw 2 Cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Useful Slime!
cards.description:
Draw 2 Cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Useful Slime!
cards.description:
Draw 2 Cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: YOU ARE MINE!
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies and remove all of their Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: YOU ARE MINE!+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies and remove all of their Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Icky
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When drawn, add a Slimed Status to your hand.

cards.name: Corrosive Spit
cards.description: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.

cards.name: Corrosive Spit+
cards.description: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Split
cards.description:
Split into a random slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split+
cards.description:
Split into a random slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Tackle
cards.description: Deal 10 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.

cards.name: Tackle+
cards.description: Deal 13 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.

cards.name: Conquer
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage. Deals 1 additional damage for each spawned Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Conquer+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage. Deals 2 additional damage for each spawned Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Divide
cards.description:
Split into a Bruiser or Acid slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Divide+
cards.description:
Split into a Bruiser AND Acid slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Protect
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block. Gains 1 additional Block for each spawned Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Protect+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block. Gains 2 additional Block for each spawned Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Serve
cards.description:
Split into a Leeching or Mire slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Serve+
cards.description:
Split into a Leeching AND Mire slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Combo Tackle
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Combo Tackle+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.
Draw a card for each Attack played this turn (Draws 1 cards).

cards.name: Divide & Conquer
cards.description:
Add a Divide and a Conquer to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Divide & Conquer+
cards.description:
Add an Upgraded Divide and an Upgraded Conquer to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Goop Spray
cards.description: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop and 3 Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Goop Spray+
cards.description: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop and 5 Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: It Looks Tasty
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. Add a random Lick card to your hand if the enemy has Goop.

cards.name: It Looks Tasty+
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. Add a random Upgraded Lick card to your hand if the enemy has Goop.

cards.name: Leech Energy
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Gain [E] and draw a card if the enemy has Goop.

cards.name: Leech Energy+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Gain [E] and draw 2 cards if the enemy has Goop.

cards.name: Leeching Touch
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to an enemy's Goop.
Deal 5 damage.

cards.name: Leeching Touch+
cards.description:
Gain Block equal to an enemy's Goop.
Deal 8 damage.

cards.name: Lick
cards.description:
Apply 1 Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lick+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Opening Tackle
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.
Add a random Tackle card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Opening Tackle+
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.
Add a random Upgraded Tackle card to your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Poison Lick
cards.description:
Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop and !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Poison.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Poison Lick+
cards.description:
Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop and !SlimeboundSlimePoison! Poison.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Press the Attack
cards.description: Deal 8 damage. If the enemy has Goop, trigger your oldest slime's attack.

cards.name: Press the Attack+
cards.description: Deal 10 damage. If the enemy has Goop, trigger your oldest slime's attack twice.

cards.name: Recollect
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.

cards.name: Recollect+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.

cards.name: Roll Through
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
Enemies receive 2 more damage from cards containing "Tackle" this combat.

cards.name: Roll Through+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.
Enemies receive 2 more damage from cards containing "Tackle" this combat.

cards.name: Sampling Lick
cards.description:
Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.
Gain 4 Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sampling Lick+
cards.description:
Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.
Gain 6 Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Serve & Protect
cards.description:
Add a Serve and a Protect to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Serve & Protect+
cards.description:
Add an Upgraded Serve and an Upgraded Protect to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Slime Spikes
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block and 3 Thorns.
Lose 3 Thorns at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Slime Spikes+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block and 4 Thorns.
Lose 4 Thorns at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Split: Acid
cards.description:
Split into an Acid_Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Acid+
cards.description:
Split into a Acid_Slime, who applies 2 more Poison this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Bruiser
cards.description:
Split into a Bruiser_Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Bruiser+
cards.description:
Split into a Bruiser_Slime, who deals 3 more damage this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Leeching
cards.description:
Split into a Leeching_Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Leeching+
cards.description:
Split into a Leeching_Slime, who grants 2 more Block this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Mire
cards.description:
Split into a Mire_Slime.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Split: Mire+
cards.description:
Split into a Mire_Slime, who applies 2 additional Goop this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Venom Tackle
cards.description: Deal 11 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. Apply 5 Poison if the enemy has Goop.

cards.name: Venom Tackle+
cards.description: Deal 13 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. Apply 7 Poison if the enemy has Goop.

cards.name: Vicious Tackle
cards.description: Deal 14 Damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. This gains twice the damage bonus from Goop.

cards.name: Vicious Tackle+
cards.description: Deal 18 Damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. This gains twice the damage bonus AND healing from Goop.

cards.name: Acidic Goop
cards.description: Apply 2 Poison whenever you Attack an enemy who has Goop.

cards.name: Acidic Goop+
cards.description: Apply 3 Poison whenever you Attack an enemy who has Goop.

cards.name: Chomp
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage twice.
The enemy receives 3 additional damage from cards containing "Tackle" this combat.

cards.name: Chomp+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage twice.
The enemy receives 3 additional damage from cards containing "Tackle" this combat.

cards.name: Disrupting Slam
cards.description: Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies. Enemies who do not intend to attack are struck twice.

cards.name: Disrupting Slam+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage to ALL enemies. Enemies who do not intend to attack are struck twice.

cards.name: Dissolve
cards.description:
Draw a card, then Exhaust a card in your hand. Add a number of random Lick cards to your hand equal to it's cost.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dissolve+
cards.description:
Draw a card, then Exhaust a card in your hand. Add a number of random Lick cards to your hand equal to it's cost plus 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Equalize
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage, heal 4 HP.
This card is played twice if below half of max HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Equalize+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage, heal 6 HP.
This card is played twice if below half of max HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Feel Our Pain
cards.description: The first time you would take damage or lose HP on each of YOUR turns, an enemy takes that much damage instead.

cards.name: Feel Our Pain+
cards.description:
Innate.
The first time you would lose HP on each of YOUR turns, an enemy takes that much damage instead.

cards.name: Finishing Tackle
cards.description: Deal 16 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. If the enemy has Goop, gain 10 Block.

cards.name: Finishing Tackle+
cards.description: Deal 20 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself. If the enemy has Goop, gain 12 Block.

cards.name: Flame Tackle
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.
Cards containing "Tackle" deal 2 more damage this combat.

cards.name: Flame Tackle+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.
Cards containing "Tackle" deal 3 more damage this combat.

cards.name: Form of Puddle
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Form of Puddle+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Intangible.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gluttony
cards.description: The first time you consume Goop each turn, add a random Lick card to your hand.

cards.name: Gluttony+
cards.description:
Innate.
The first time you consume Goop each turn, add a random Lick card to your hand.

cards.name: Goop Armor
cards.description: Gain 4 Block whenever you Attack an enemy who has Goop.

cards.name: Goop Armor+
cards.description: Gain 6 Block whenever you Attack an enemy who has Goop.

cards.name: Grow
cards.description: Lose 1 Slime slot in exchange for 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Grow+
cards.description: Lose 1 Slime slot in exchange for 2 Strength and 2 Dexterity.

cards.name: Growth Punch
cards.description:
Deal 6 Damage.
Increase this card's damage permanently by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Growth Punch+
cards.description:
Deal 6 Damage.
Gain 1 Block.
Increase these effects permanently by 1.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Haunting Lick
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable and !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Haunting Lick+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable and !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hungry Tackle
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.
Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.

cards.name: Hungry Tackle+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage and !SlimeboundSelfharm! damage to yourself.
Return a random 0-cost Exhausted card to your hand.

cards.name: Lead By Example
cards.description: The first card you play each turn that targets enemies also causes your oldest slime to Attack.

cards.name: Lead By Example+
cards.description: The first 2 cards you play each turn that targets enemies also cause your oldest slime to Attack.

cards.name: Leech Life
cards.description:
Deal 2 damage.
Apply 2 Poison.
Heal 2 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Leech Life+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Apply 3 Poison.
Heal 3 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Level Up
cards.description: Gain 1 Potency.

cards.name: Level Up+
cards.description: Gain 2 Potency.

cards.name: Living Wall
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop to attackers this turn.

cards.name: Living Wall+
cards.description:
Gain 15 Block.
Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop to attackers this turn.

cards.name: Mega-Lick
cards.description:
Apply 1 Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mega-Lick+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak and !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Minion Master
cards.description:
Gain 1 Slime slot.
When a spawned Slime applies Goop, Poison, or Block, it applies 1 more.

cards.name: Minion Master+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Slime slots.
When a spawned Slime applies Goop, Poison, or Block, it applies 1 more.

cards.name: Pile On!
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. Trigger all of your Slime's attacks.

cards.name: Pile On!+
cards.description: Deal 4 damage. Trigger all of your Slime's attacks.

cards.name: Prepare
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
On your next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prepare+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
On your next turn, gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Protect the Boss
cards.description: Prevent the next time you would be damaged by an enemy Attack, Absorbing your oldest Slime instead.

cards.name: Protect the Boss+
cards.description: Prevent the next time you would be damaged by an enemy Attack, Absorbing your oldest Slime instead.

cards.name: Quick Study
cards.description:
Add a random Spire_Boss card to your hand.
Lose 5 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Quick Study+
cards.description:
Add a random Spire_Boss card to your hand.
Lose 2 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rain of Goop
cards.description: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop to a random enemy 4 times.

cards.name: Rain of Goop+
cards.description: Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop to a random enemy 6 times.

cards.name: Recklessness
cards.description: Cards containing Tackle deal 6 more damage to enemies, and 2 more damage to you.

cards.name: Recklessness+
cards.description: Cards containing Tackle deal 9 more damage to enemies, and 2 more damage to you.

cards.name: Rejuvenating Lick
cards.description:
Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.
Heal 2 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Rejuvenating Lick+
cards.description:
Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.
Heal 3 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Replication
cards.description:
Choose a card in your hand. Add a copy of that card to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Replication+
cards.description:
Choose a card in your hand. Add a copy of that card to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Repurpose
cards.description:
Morph a card in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Repurpose+
cards.description:
Draw a card.
Morph a card in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Self-Forming Goo
cards.description: Whenever you lose HP, apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop to a random enemy and gain 2 Block at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Self-Forming Goo+
cards.description: Whenever you lose HP, apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop to a random enemy and gain 2 Block at the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Slime Tap
cards.description:
Absorb your oldest Slime. Gain [E] [E] and draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Slime Tap+
cards.description:
Absorb your oldest Slime. Gain [E] [E] and draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Soul Sicken
cards.description:
Apply 3 Poison.
Convert half of the enemy's Goop to Poison.

cards.name: Soul Sicken+
cards.description:
Apply 5 Poison.
Convert half of the enemy's Goop to Poison.

cards.name: Tongue Lash
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Deals 1 additional damage for ALL of your cards containing "Lick" (including Exhausted cards).

cards.name: Tongue Lash+
cards.description: Deal 5 damage. Deals 2 additional damage for ALL of your cards containing "Lick" (including Exhausted cards).

cards.name: Toxin Strike
cards.description:
Deal 5 Damage. The enemy loses HP equal to its Poison, then reduce its Poison by 1.
Exhaust

cards.name: Toxin Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 5 Damage. The enemy loses HP equal to twice its Poison, then reduce its Poison by 2.
Exhaust

cards.name: Acid Tongue
cards.description: Apply 1 Poison whenever you apply Goop.

cards.name: Acid Tongue+
cards.description:
Apply 1 Poison whenever you apply Goop.
Effects that apply Goop apply 1 more.

cards.name: Consult Playbook
cards.description:
Add 4 random Tackle cards to your hand. They cost 1 less this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Consult Playbook+
cards.description:
Add 4 random Tackle cards to your hand. They cost 1 less this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Douse in Slime
cards.description:
Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.
The next time an Attack is used on this enemy, Goop benefits will apply without consuming Goop.

cards.name: Douse in Slime+
cards.description:
Apply !SlimeboundSlimed! Goop.
The next time an Attack is used on this enemy, Goop benefits will apply without consuming Goop.

cards.name: Duplicated Form
cards.description:
Lose 15 HP and 15 Max HP this combat.
The first card you play each turn that targets enemies is played twice.

cards.name: Duplicated Form+
cards.description:
Lose 15 HP and 15 Max HP this combat.
Gain [E] each turn.
The first card you play each turn that targets enemies is played twice.

cards.name: Mass Feed
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage to ALL enemies.
For each non-minion enemy killed, raise your Max HP by 3.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mass Feed+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage to ALL enemies.
For each non-minion enemy killed, raise your Max HP by 4.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mass Repurpose
cards.description:
Draw a card.
Morph all cards in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mass Repurpose+
cards.description:
Draw a card.
Morph all cards in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ooze Bath
cards.description:
Double an enemy's Goop.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ooze Bath+
cards.description:
Double an enemy's Poison and Goop.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overexert
cards.description:
Gain 4 Potency.
2 turns from now, Absorb all of your spawned slimes.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overexert+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Potency.
3 turns from now, Absorb all of your spawned slimes.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prepare: Crush
cards.description:
On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and 3 Strength, and add SLIME CRUSH to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Prepare: Crush+
cards.description:
On your next turn, gain [E] [E] [E] and 3 Strength, and add SLIME CRUSH to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Recycling
cards.description: At the start of your next 5 turns, return a random Exhausted 0-cost card to your hand.

cards.name: Recycling+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your next 5 turns, return a random Exhausted 0-cost card to your hand.

cards.name: Slime Brawl
cards.description:
Play the top card of your draw pile. Repeat for each of your spawned Slimes.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Slime Brawl+
cards.description:
Play the top card of your draw pile. Repeat for each of your spawned Slimes.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Study the Spire
cards.description: Add a random Spire_Boss card to your hand at the start of your next 3 turns.

cards.name: Study the Spire+
cards.description: Add a random Spire_Boss card to your hand at the start of your next 4 turns.

cards.name: Super Split
cards.description:
Gain X Slime slots.
Split into a random slime X times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Super Split+
cards.description:
Gain X+1 Slime slots.
Split into a random slime X+1 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Teamwork
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Trigger your 2 oldest Slime's attacks X times.

cards.name: Teamwork+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Trigger your 3 oldest Slime's attacks X times.

cards.name: Waste Not
cards.description:
Return all 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Waste Not+
cards.description:
Return all 0-cost Exhausted cards to your hand.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Heart of Goo
relics.description: Split into a random Slime at the start of combat.

relics.name: Goop Dweller
relics.description: At the start of combat, Split into a Bruiser slime.
relics.flavorText: He followed me home. Can I keep it?

relics.name: Slime Plushie
relics.description: At the start of combat, Split into a Leeching slime and gain 1 Slime slot.

relics.name: Slimy Tea Set
relics.description: When you enter a Rest site, begin the next combat with a Prepare card that costs 0 for your first turn.
relics.flavorText: Definitely not the key to a refreshing night's rest.

relics.name: Ooze Stone
relics.description: At the start of combat, Split into a Mire Slime and gain 1 Potency.
relics.flavorText: It is said to gain power based on your mood.

relics.name: Slimed Tail
relics.description: When you fall below 50% of your Maximum HP, Split into an Acid Slime, and the next time you take damage, your oldest slime is Absorbed instead. (works once per combat).
relics.flavorText: A fake tail to trick enemies during combat, completely covered in slime.

relics.name: Slimy Skull
relics.description: Whenever you apply Goop, apply an additional 1 Goop.
relics.flavorText: A snecko skull in absolutely awful condition. Unclean and slimy, dirt and grime stick to it like glue.

relics.name: Greed Ooze
relics.description:
At the start of combat, spawn Greed Ooze.
At Rest sites, Greed Ooze will take 50 of your gold, increasing its damage by 1.
relics.flavorText: A friend found in the Spire who hoards gold.

relics.name: Scrap Ooze
relics.description:
At the start of combat, spawn Scrap Ooze.
At Rest sites, you can donate a card to the Scrap Ooze, granting +1 damage for Uncommons, +2 damage for Rares, -2 damage for Curses.

relics.name: Slime the Spire
relics.description:
Custom Run Modifier
All enemies form into two Slime enemies at 50% HP.
relics.flavorText: ALWAYS Split. Why is this a relic? Cause I can't figure out how to add the custom mod to the list of active mods UI!

relics.name: Black Heart of Goo
relics.description: Replaces Heart of Goo. At the start of combat, Split into two random slimes, gain 1 Potency, and gain 1 Slime slot.

relics.name: Tiny Bowler Hat
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a Study the Spire card to your hand. It costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Whosoever controls the hat, controls the Spire.

relics.name: Protective Gear
relics.description: Reduce the damage you take from Tackle cards by 1.
relics.flavorText: The best defense is a good offense.

potions.name: Slimy Elixir
potions.description: Whenever an effect applies Goop, apply 2 more.

potions.name: Ooze-Infused Drink
potions.description: Add 4 random 0-cost cards to your hand.

keywords.name: Absorb
keywords.description: Recombine with a spawned Slime, returning the Max HP it took upon Splitting.

keywords.name: Acid slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 2 and applies 1 Poison each turn.

keywords.name: Bronze slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 6 and grants you 4 Block each turn.

keywords.name: Bruiser slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 4 each turn.

keywords.name: Conquer
keywords.description:
1-cost Attack.
Deal 10 damage, plus 1 damage (2 damage if upgraded) for each spawned Slime.
Exhaust

keywords.name: Cultist slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 6 each turn, then increases it's damage by 1.

keywords.name: Divide
keywords.description:
1-cost Skill.
Split into a Bruiser or Acid slime (both if upgraded).
Exhaust.

keywords.name: Ghostflame slime
keywords.description: Does not attack and is unaffected by Potency. Provides 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, and 2 Potency.

keywords.name: Goop
keywords.description: The next attack deals 1 more damage per Goop, consuming the Goop effect and healing you for 3 HP.

keywords.name: Leeching slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 2 and grants you 2 Block each turn.

keywords.name: Lick
keywords.description: 0-cost cards that apply Goop a variety of secondary effects.

keywords.name: Mire slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 1 and applies 2 Goop each turn.

keywords.name: Morph
keywords.description: Replace with a random new card of your class, regardless of type. It costs 1 less.

keywords.name: Potency
keywords.description: Increases the damage of ALL of your Spawned Slimes.

keywords.name: Protect
keywords.description:
1-cost Skill.
Gain 8 Block, plus 1 Block (2 Block if upgraded) for each spawned Slime.
Exhaust

keywords.name: Serve
keywords.description:
1-cost Skill.
Split into a Leeching or Mire slime (both if upgraded).
Exhaust.

keywords.name: Spire boss
keywords.description: Powerful 0-cost cards, inspired by the bosses of the Spire.

keywords.name: Split
keywords.description: Lose 3 HP and spawn a Slime minion, who attacks at the start of each turn. While the Slime is alive, your Max HP is reduced by 3.

keywords.name: Tackle
keywords.description: High-damage Attacks that also deal a small amount of damage to you.

keywords.name: Torch head slime
keywords.description: Attacks for 6 each turn. Gains twice the normal benefit from Potency.
